entry.title: Thoughts From Lee Kuan Yew In FORBES
Jerry Reinsdorf joins usual list of Illinoisans on Forbes billionaire list
entry.summary: A record 1,826 billionaires made the 2015 list, with an aggregate net worth of $7.05 trillion, up from $6.4 trillion last year, Forbes said.

entry.title:
Forbes says that Bill Gates's net worth rose to $US79.2 billion ($A101.27 billion) in 2015 from $US76 billion last year.

Forbes says there were 1826 billionaires on its list this year, up from 1645 in 2014.

It's the 29th year for Forbes billionaires' list.

Forbes said Monday, March 2, 2015, that Jordan's net worth is estimated at $1 billion, thanks to his well-timed investment in the Charlotte Hornets.

This is his first year on Forbes' annual list which typically is released in March.

Forbes last June listed Jordan's equity as owner of the Hornets is $416 million and his net worth outside of the team to be $600 million.
How Can West Africa Rebuild After Ebola?
entry.summary: According to Forbes, Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko and fashion designer Michael Kors were among 138 people from last year's list who dropped out of the rankings this year.
